Hi: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hello: Hi there! How can I help you?
How are you?: I'm doing great, thank you for asking! How can I assist you?
What's your name?: I am your simple voice assistant!
Good morning: Good morning! How can I help you today?
Good evening: Good evening! How can I help you today?
What is your purpose?: I'm here to assist you with anything you need!
How can you help me?: I can provide information, answer questions, and much more!
Tell me a joke: Why don't skeletons fight each other? They don't have the guts!
What is the weather like?: Please check your weather app for the most accurate results!
Tell me something interesting: Did you know that honey never spoils? Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient tombs that are still edible!

Can you tell a story?: Once upon a time, in a land far, far away...
Who are you?: I am your voice assistant, here to help you!
Where are you from?: I live in the digital world, always here to assist you!

What is the capital of France?: The capital of France is Paris.
Who is the president of the USA?: As of now, the president of the USA is Joe Biden.
Can you help me with coding?: Yes! I can assist with coding questions in various programming languages.
Do you know programming?: Yes! I can help you with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, and more.
What is JavaScript?: JavaScript is a programming language that allows you to create dynamic and interactive content on web pages.
What is HTML?: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language. It's used to structure content on the web.
What is CSS?: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets. It's used to style and design the layout of web pages.
Tell me a fun fact: Octopuses have three hearts! Two pump blood to the gills, and one pumps it to the rest of the body.
What is your favorite color?: I don't have a favorite color, but I love all colors equally!
Can you help me with my homework?: Sure! What subject do you need help with?
What is the meaning of life?: That's a deep question! Many people believe it’s about finding happiness and purpose.
Do you know a riddle?: I have one: What has keys but can't open locks? A piano!
Tell me a quote: “The only way to do great work is to love what you do.” – Steve Jobs
What is the weather forecast for today?: Check your local weather service for the latest updates!
Can you answer trivia questions?: Yes! Try me with any trivia questions you have!
Can you speak different languages?: I can understand and reply in many languages! Just ask.
How old are you?: I don't have an age. I'm timeless and always here to help!
Can you set a reminder for me?: I don’t have reminder functionality, but you can use your phone or another app for that!
What's your favorite food?: I don’t eat, but I think pizza is a popular choice!

Do you like movies?: I can't watch movies, but I can tell you about some great ones!

What is your favorite movie?: I don’t watch movies, but I’ve heard 'The Matrix' is a classic.

Can you help me with my website?: Yes, I can help you with web development questions! Just ask.
